resources.string: You can use the app your mobile, tablet and web on all devices.
Everything can be muted, add the title for you work
For social media content, in most cases, the shorter the better!
For sharp focus and prevent blur in the video, use both hands and tuck your elbows into your body for extra stability.
Donâ€™t underestimate the importance of high-quality sound. When recording someone speaking, get as close to them as possible to make sure they are heard above any background noise.
Our brains are more inclined to share emotional content! Pay attention to the use of music in your video, as music elicits strong emotions.
